ability_description: This ability only activates if the Amalgam has available empty Cargo Space before attacking. After winning a battle, if the target has more resources than the Amalgam's available Cargo Space, the Amalgam fills its Cargo Space and then takes an additional amount of the remaining resources
As long as the opponent's ship is Burning, if the opponent is hit with the Obliterator weapon, the AUGUR increases all weapon damage (Cumulative)
The Mining Rate of Crystal is increased
When defending the Station, The BORTAS increases the damage of all the other ships and Defense Platforms
The Botany Bay's Mining Bonus from the Mining Laser, when mining Corrupted Data and Decoded Data, is increased
When fighting Hostiles, for the first round of Combat, the B'REL decreases the opponent's ship Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy
When defending , The CENTURION increases the Armor, Shield deflection and Dodge of all ships and defense platforms
Each time the Corvus is hit, it increases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy (Cumulative)

Reinforce Ships: Greatly reinforces other ships vs Armadas based on their Defiant research. Defiant Weaponry: Unlock powerful buffs which grant significantly enhanced effectiveness vs Jem'Hadar Solo Armadas when in combat with the Defiant. Bajoran Currency: Increases Bajoran Badges and Credits received from the ""Defiant Amplified Claim"". Resourceful Approach: Increase Edict rewards when using the Defiant
The USS Discovery's Mycelium harvesting speed is increased
